DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification number of a Parameter Value unit term is selected from an ontology or a controlled vocabulary.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug._The procedure of having an identity established._Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.

Property.preferredDefinition: A Parameter is a replaceable value in a Parameterizable class.  Examples of Parameters include: scanning wavelength, laser power, centrifuge speed, multiplicative errors, the number of input nodes to a SOM, and PCR temperatures.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.:The procedure of having an identity established.

Concepts.definition: Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
The procedure of having an identity established.

DataElementConcept.origin: ISA-TAB-Nano:Investigation Study Assay Excel Table Format for Nanotechnology

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing._A control number unique to an object, used to identify it among the other objects in a collection._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.:A control number unique to an object, used to identify it among the other objects in a collection.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.
A control number unique to an object.  It is used to identify the object among other objects in a collection.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
